~~~ ABOUT ~~~
In this directory lies this file and the test CHIP8 binaries that I wrote
myself.


~~~ LISTING ~~~
1. FONTTEST
Draws the built-in glyphs for the characters 0..F at the coordinates (0, 4*i).
Upon pressing a corresponding key, the glyph on the screen will be inverted.

2. STOPATCH1
Draws a digit in the center of the screen that is being incremented by one
every second

3. STOPWATCH2
Draws a 3-digit number in the center of the screen that is incremented by one
every second.
